DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A general textual description of a design, work task, plan, etc. that is being approved for.

DocAttribute.Name: ApprovalDateTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: Date and time when the result of the approval process is produced.

DocAttribute.Name: ApprovalStatus
DocAttribute.Documentation: The result or current status of the approval, e.g. Requested, Processed, Approved, Not Approved.

DocAttribute.Name: ApprovalLevel
DocAttribute.Documentation: Level of the approval e.g. Draft v.s. Completed design.

DocAttribute.Name: ApprovalQualifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Textual description of special constraints or conditions for the approval.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: A human readable name given to an approval.

DocAttribute.Name: Identifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: A computer interpretable identifier by which the approval is known.

DocAttribute.Name: Actors
DocAttribute.Documentation: The set of relationships by which the actors acting in specified roles on this approval are known.

DocAttribute.Name: IsRelatedWith
DocAttribute.Documentation: The set of relationships by which this approval is related to others.

DocAttribute.Name: Relates
DocAttribute.Documentation: The set of relationships by which other approvals are related to this one.
